description: Responsive page header for minimally branded sites, eg B2B tools, documentation sites, and internal tools.

demos.name: very-simple
demos.title: Site title only
demos.description: If your site has no navigation you can use this top bar only.

demos.name: one-level-of-navigation
demos.title: Header with navigation add-on
demos.description: For sites with a few pages, there is a navigation style available. These nav items collapse into a drawer at narrow screen widths.

demos.name: two-levels-of-navigation
demos.title: Header with a primary and secondary navigation
demos.description: For sites with more than a few sections, a secondary navigation is also available

demos.name: themes
demos.title: Product themes
demos.description: This component is themable. The current available themes are B2B and B2C. If you're creating a product that isn't within B2B or B2C please contact Origami.

demos.name: pa11y
demos.description: Accessibility test will be run against this demo
